name: EncouragementTodayRadio
0:
”Alexa, open encouragement today radio”
”Alexa, ask encouragement today radio for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start encouragement today radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: encouragement today radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Listen to the latest radio episodes from Encouragement Today with Don Hawkins. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can also say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
